draftNumber.description: The identifier of the draft document. It is generated and returned in the response when the draft is first created.

type.description:
The set of registration types supported by this API.

  1. EXEMPTION_NON_RES - non-residential exemption
  2. EXEMPTION_RES - residential exemption
  3. MHREG - manufactured home registration
  4. PERMIT - transport permit
  5. TRAND - transfer due to the death of a joint tenant
  6. TRANS - transfer sale or gift

createDateTime.description: Generated by the MHR application and included in a response, the date and time a record is created in the system.

lastUpdateDateTime.description: Generated by the MHR application and included in a response, the date and time of the last change to the draft. Null if no update is made.

outOfDate.description: Generated by the MHR application, for change registrations indicates the draft is stale as another registration on the home was created after the draft was created.
